summary: Website project for Nath Cyber Cafe: modern, professional, responsive marketing site for graphic design services, school projects, and college assignments with WhatsApp integration, SEO, gallery, and testimonials.
architectural_notes: Site design: clean minimalist layout; royal blue/cyan/white palette; modern sans-serif fonts; smooth scrolling; mobile-first responsive UI.

Core pages/sections: Hero with CTA buttons (View Services, Contact Now via WhatsApp), Service cards with icons + descriptions + optional starting price + Order Now buttons; Why Choose; Contact section with form and Google Map placeholder; Gallery; Testimonials.
Technical: SEO-optimized structure, fast-loading, mobile-optimized, include social media links.
Integrations: WhatsApp floating button and WhatsApp CTA buttons.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal modern logomark for a digital service business, royal blue and cyan on white background (nath-logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide gallery image showing a clean logo/branding mockup on stationery (gallery-01.dim_1200x900.png)
- Wide gallery image showing a modern poster/banner design mockup (gallery-02.dim_1200x900.png)
- Wide gallery image showing an academic project/assignment cover page design mockup (gallery-03.dim_1200x900.png)

## Edit Images
- Update the illustration to depict graphic design and academic work in a clean minimalist style, matching royal blue/cyan/white palette (hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png > hero-illustration-v2.dim_1200x800.png)
- Refine the existing logo to match the new minimalist royal blue/cyan identity (logo.dim_512x512.png > logo-v2.dim_512x512.png)
- Refine the header logo to match the updated branding (header-logo.dim_512x512.png > header-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Update the Home page hero section to match the new business focus and exact hero copy: Headline “Professional Graphic Design & Academic Project Solutions”; Subheading “Creative Designs & Neat Academic Work at Affordable Prices”; primary CTA “View Services” (links to /services); secondary CTA “Contact Now” that opens WhatsApp chat using the configured WhatsApp number.

Replace the current Services content model and UI to support service cards with: icon, service name, short description, optional starting price placeholder, and an “Order Now” button that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message containing the selected service name. Implement this for three service sections: (1) Graphic Design Services with the 8 requested items; (2) School Project Services with the 6 requested items and the provided section description; (3) College Assignment Services with the 6 requested items and the provided section description.

Update the Home page to include: (a) a Services section that highlights the three main service areas (Graphic Design, School Projects, College Assignments) with attractive icon cards and a link to the full Services page; (b) a new Gallery section that shows a responsive grid of previous-work images (static assets) with a simple “view larger” interaction; (c) a new Testimonials section displaying at least 3 testimonials (static content) in a professional card layout.
Add a persistent floating WhatsApp button visible across the entire site (all routes), fixed to the bottom-right corner, linking to WhatsApp chat using the configured WhatsApp number.

Update site navigation and footer “Quick Links” to match the new site focus by removing the Government Jobs link from the header and footer navigation (the site should prioritize Home, About, Services, Contact).

Update SEO metadata and structured data defaults to reflect the new service focus (graphic design + school projects + college assignments) instead of government jobs/general online services. Ensure each main page (Home, Services, Contact) has an appropriate title and description aligned with the new content.

Ensure contact details match the user request on the Contact section/page: business name “Nath Cyber Cafe”, phone number “9435212145 / 9126026463”, and WhatsApp integration. Keep the contact form fields as Name, Phone, Message, and keep the Google Map location placeholder section.

Maintain a clean, minimalist, professional royal blue + cyan + white visual theme across all updated/new sections, using modern sans-serif typography and consistent spacing, ensuring the full site remains mobile-first responsive and fast-loading (avoid heavy assets/scripts).

Add social media links area (icons/links) in the footer and ensure they are present and styled consistently. Keep WhatsApp as a working link; leave other social links as placeholders if no real URLs are provided.
Render any newly generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the Gallery section (and any updated branding/hero illustration if applicable).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a modern, professional, responsive website for Nath Cyber Cafe including Home hero, services sections (Graphic Design, School Projects, College Assignments), Why Choose Us, Contact (form + WhatsApp + map placeholder), gallery, testimonials, and social links with royal blue/cyan/white theme and smooth scrolling.

Update backend cafe info response to return a WhatsApp number consistent with the frontend configuration (use 9126026463) so any frontend usage of backend cafe info cannot display a mismatched WhatsApp number.
